s.text: But I don't think preferences are the right way to get there.
But I think that what happens at home in the years before school is a critical part of the problem.
But I think that what happens at home in the years before school is a critical part of the problem.
But I think that what happens at home in the years before school is a critical part of the problem.
I believe college admissions offices and corporate personnel departments do literally prefer to admit and hire people of color for certain slots.
